translated: and it makes the meaning related to those words, another meaning not directly expressed, the primary object of expression. That is called the compound of many syllables.

original: bdun pa khyad bar du 'bru mang po la'o //

original: 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir rnam dbye bdun pa khyad par du bya ba ste tshig gnyis sam mang po bsgrigs pa'i tshig snga ma de bdun pa'i don can yin na snga ma kho nar gnas la tshig sbyor gyi skabs tshig phyi ma bdun ba'i don can
analyzed: 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i skabs 'dir rnam dbye bdun pa khyad par du bya ba ste tshig gnyis sam mang po bsgrigs pa'i tshig snga ma de bdun pa'i don can yin na snga ma kho nar gnas la tshig sbyor gyi skabs tshig phyi ma bdun ba'i don can
translated: In this section on the collection of many words, the seventh case is the specific, that is, when two or more words are arranged in a phrase and the first word has the meaning of the seventh case, the first remains as it is and the second word in the phrase has the meaning of the seventh case.🔽🔽

original: yin na de sngon du 'jog pa 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i khyad chos yin no //
analyzed: yin na de sngon du 'jog pa 'bru mang po'i bsdu ba'i khyad chos yin no //
translated: In the case of the compound of many words, the seventh case is the special one. If the first word of a compound of two or more words has the meaning of the seventh case, it remains as it is. But if the latter word of the compound has the meaning of the seventh case, it is placed first. This is the special feature of the compound of many words.
